frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-you2ber
frozen.longDescription:
Gnome Youtube Downloader

 Simple helper for youtube-dl project. It allows you to save locally desired media content without any browser extensions. Just copy URL address of a media content to the clipboard and select desired quality profile or custom format for the item in the extension menu to store it.
 * Required the installation of ffmpeg (youtube-dl dependency for media manipulation)

For more information and how-to see README.md
